mapper.sql: goods_id, cat_id, goods_sn, goods_name, brand_id, goods_number, goods_weight, market_price, shop_price, cost_price, warn_number, keywords, goods_brief, act_desc, goods_thumb, goods_img, original_img, is_real, is_on_sale, is_alone_sale, is_shipping, integral, create_date, update_date, sort_order, is_delete, is_best, is_new, is_hot, is_promote, is_special, bonus_type_id, goods_type, give_integral, rank_integral, user_id, store_id, app_desc
mapper.select:
select
from hai_goods where goods_id = #{goods_id} and store_id = #{store_id} limit 0,1

select count(*) from hai_goods where store_id = #{store_id}
and cat_id in (${cat_id})
and (goods_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or goods_sn like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or act_desc like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or keywords like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or goods_desc like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
and is_new = 1
